original_text: After the king was settled in his palace and the Lord had given him rest from all his enemies around him,
korean_text: 여호와께서 주위의 모든 원수를 무찌르사 왕으로 궁에 평안히 살게 하신 때에

sentences.original_text: After the king was settled in his palace
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그의 궁궐에 자리 잡은 후에

sentences.original_text: and the Lord had given him rest
from all his enemies around him
